messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
Jogging is about rhythm.
Battling is about rhythm, too!
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT: It’s a goal of sorts, I’d say!
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
If I get out of rhythm, I can’t get my
act together.
messages.TRMSG_NOT_MORNING_UNUSED:
When I was jogging the other day,
a wild Pokémon came after me.I ran so fast, I was on top of the
waves, I swear!
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
Jogging is about rhythm.
Battling is about rhythm, too. Our rematch is also about rhythm!
